testcase.name: New bank account creation
testcase.system-out: Given user types username "stefan10" and password "stefan10"................passed When he clicks Log In button................................................passed Then user will be logged into his account...................................passed Given user clicks Open New Account..........................................passed When Open New Account window is displayed he selects type of account "SAVINGS".passed And user submits creation...................................................passed Then new bank account is opened.............................................passed

testcase.name: Check find transaction option using date
testcase.system-out: Given user types username "stefan10" and password "stefan10"................passed When he clicks Log In button................................................passed Then user will be logged into his account...................................passed Given user clicks Find Transactions.........................................passed When he set today date......................................................passed And clicks Find Transactions................................................passed Then transaction results are displayed......................................passed
